channel.title: CVE Feed for SHARP CORPORATION -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SHARP CORPORATION -- all products

item.title: CVE-2020-5571|2024-08-04T08:30:24.624Z -- sharp%20corporation -- sharp%20aquos%20series
item.description: SHARP AQUOS series (AQUOS SH-M02 build number 01.00.05 and earlier, AQUOS SH-RM02 build number 01.00.04 and earlier, AQUOS mini SH-M03 build number 01.00.04 and earlier, AQUOS Keitai SH-N01 build number 01.00.01 and earlier, AQUOS L2 (UQ mobile/J:COM) build number 01.00.05 and earlier, AQUOS sense lite SH-M05 build number 03.00.04 and earlier, AQUOS sense (UQ mobile) build number 03.00.03 and earlier, AQUOS compact SH-M06 build number 02.00.02 and earlier, AQUOS sense plus SH-M07 build number 02.00.02 and earlier, AQUOS sense2 SH-M08 build number 02.00.05 and earlier, and AQUOS sense2 (UQ mobile) build number 02.00.06 and earlier) allow an attacker to obtain the sensitive information of the device via malicious applications installed on the device.

item.title: CVE-2024-23786|2024-02-14T10:08:32.703Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Cross-site scripting vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary script on the web browser of the user who is accessing the management page of the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23787|2024-02-14T10:09:45.961Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain an arbitrary file in the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23784|2024-02-14T10:05:55.231Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Improper access control vulnerability exists in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier, which may allow a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to obtain a username and its hashed password displayed on the management page of the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23788|2024-02-14T10:10:41.448Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Server-side request forgery vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to send an arbitrary HTTP request (GET) from the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23789|2024-02-14T10:35:11.140Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to execute an arbitrary OS command on the affected product.

item.title: CVE-2024-23785|2024-02-14T10:07:11.603Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Cross-site request forgery vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a remote unauthenticated attacker to change the product settings.

item.title: CVE-2024-23783|2024-02-14T10:02:32.489Z -- sharp%20corporation -- energy%20management%20controller%20with%20cloud%20services
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in Energy Management Controller with Cloud Services JH-RVB1 /JH-RV11 Ver.B0.1.9.1 and earlier allows a network-adjacent unauthenticated attacker to access the affected product without authentication.
